thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 5 of 137
thread.title: Tyna Silver

author: Tyna Silver
title: Tyna Silver
text: Easy to choose caregivers by location and proper fit of caregiver/pet preferences. You can interview and speak to various choices and discuss your needs personally. We had 2 in person meet and greets before sealing the deal. The company follows up with client suggestions and important information forms for the pet sitter. The process is very personal yet professional, as much as I would expect for hiring a human caregiver. My first experience, but so far, excellent.
